item.title: Peak District
item.description: On Monday the 11th of November 2019 I set out to Ijmuiden (NL) to hop on the ferry to Newcastle. From there I’d catch the intercity train to Sheffield where I’d change to a regional train that’d take me to Heathersage. A couple degrees Celsius above zero, it was apparent fall had set in on the English midlands. Starting on my bike tour Wednesday morning, I had about 70 kilometers of mountainbike trails ahead of me.

item.title: Ardennes Arbalete
item.description: In July 2019 I hopped on the train to Maastricht to start my first proper bikepacking trip on my ECR. The Ardennes Arbalete sparked my interest months prior. I just got my Surly ECR in May, and went for an overnighter in the Veluwe (NL) in June. Hence, I didn’t quite know what to expect on a multi-day tour. Questions like; How will the bike hold up? Will the powerbank have enough juice?
